snippet: Gov. Chris Christie’s administration has appealed to the State Supreme Court, asking to block a lower court’s order that would allow same-sex marriages in New Jersey.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie’s administration is appealing to New Jersey State Supreme Court, asking it to block a lower court’s order that would allow same-sex marriages in state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie’s administration has appealed to the State Supreme Court, asking to block a lower court’s order that would allow same-sex marriages in New Jersey.

headline.main: Christie Wants State’s Top Court to Block Gay Marriage Ruling
headline.print_headline: Christie Wants State’s Top Court To Block Gay Marriage Ruling

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
